definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women
pinyin: Xiao1 chu2 dui4 Fu4 nu:3 Yi1 qie4 Xing2 shi4 Qi2 shi4 Gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 消除對婦女一切形式歧視公約

sentences.english: 'We are still ironing out the bugs in the system,' said Dr. Lamont.
sentences.chinese: 拉蒙特說，我們仍在消除系統中的小故障。
你能給這句話消除歧義嗎。

sentences.english: Compensation method was used to eliminate disturbance of coexisting element titanium.
sentences.chinese: 以補償法消除共存元素鈦對鈣的測定干擾。

sentences.english: The most commonly asked question concerning cellulite is how to get rid of it.
sentences.chinese: 關於瘦身，人們最常問到的問題就是如何消除脂肪。

sentences.english: Applying the market rule to electronic unfair competition disputes is not always easy.
sentences.chinese: 運用該市場規律來消除電子不正當競爭並不容易。

sentences.english: To the grammar which assigns eliminates the left recursion.
sentences.chinese: 對給定的文法消除左遞歸。

sentences.english: Try to drink plenty of water or electrolyte fluids to get rid of stomach virus.
sentences.chinese: 爲了消除腸胃感染病毒，要喝大量的水或電解質液體。

sentences.english: The performance of the adaptive algorithm can directly affect the effect of the echo canceller.
sentences.chinese: 自適應算法的性能直接影響着回波消除器的效果。

sentences.english: After tough training, I got rid of my self-abasement and became confident.
sentences.chinese: 經過艱苦的訓練，使我增強了自信心，消除了自卑感。

sentences.english: A score of 100 points integer times, eliminate a bright Red Cross.
sentences.chinese: 分數達到100分的整數倍，消除一個亮紅的交叉。

sentences.english: Eliminating problem by transferring the blame to others is often called scape-goating.
sentences.chinese: 消除問題靠轉移指責給別人常常被叫做替罪羊現象。

sentences.english: The so-called "green barriers" cannot be completely eliminated in a short term.
sentences.chinese: 所謂的“綠色壁壘”短期內沒可能完全消除。

sentences.english: Preventive measures in industry include inerting and elimination of ignition sources.
sentences.chinese: 工業預防措施包括惰化和消除點火源。

sentences.english: Ease-of-use reduces training time and eliminates critical paths.
sentences.chinese: 易用性可以減少培訓時間並消除一些苛刻途徑。

sentences.english: ORS and zinc bring the risk of death down to almost zero.
sentences.chinese: 而口服補液鹽和補鋅可幾乎完全消除死亡危險。

definition: to clear away/to eliminate/to get rid of
to bring relief/to alleviate (a crisis)/to dull (a pain)
to remove/to sack/to get rid of/to relieve (sb of their duties)/to free/to lift (an embargo)/to rescind (an agreement)
to sweep/to clean with a brush/to sweep away (often fig.)
to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
to dissolve/to resolve (contradictions)/to dispel (doubts)/to iron out (difficulties)/to defuse (conflicts)/to neutralize (fears)
to arise/to come into being/to come about/to give rise to/to bring into being/to bring about/to produce/to engender/to generate/to appear/appearance/emergence/generation/production/yield
